amendment.description: To establish the United States Military Cancer Institute.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1393 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1393 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Inouye. (consideration: CR S8651-8653; text: CR S8652) To establish the United States Military Cancer Institute.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1393 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1393 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Inouye.
